# btt22

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of btt22 is to help you build the [**ussie**](https://github.com/ijlyttle/ussie) package during the [Building Tidy Tools 2022](https://github.com/rstudio-conf-2022/build-tidy-tools) workshop.

## Installation

You can install the development version of btt22 like so:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("ijlyttle/btt22")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(btt22)
## coming soon
```
